name: Dwarven Mine
description: A vast mining complex carved by dwarven craftsmen contains valuable minerals, precious metals, and ancient dwarven technology. The rich deposits and dwarven craftsmanship attract miners and traders, while the deep tunnels can hide dangerous creatures or unstable geological formations.
atmosphere: Perfectly carved stone chambers stretch into torch-lit depths while support beams showcase masterful dwarven engineering. The air carries metallic scents of precious ore and stone dust. Ancient mining equipment and gem-filled carts line the tunnels. Water drips steadily from crystalline formations overhead.
